text: visvasigale, allahana adesa palisiri mattu allahana dutara hagu nim'ma paiki adhikara sthanadalliruvavara adesa palisiri. Nivu allahanalli hagu paralokadalli nambike ullavaragiddare, yavudadaru visayadalli nim'ma naduve vivada untadaga, adannu allah mattavana dutaredege maralisiri. Iduve atyuttama dhoraneyagide hagu idara parinamavu uttamavagiruttade
